title: Person of Interest 3x17 Root path : Root cares
author: George Finch
comment: Loved this scene. It really shows Root's evolution from the beginning of the season and also seasons 1 and 2. Thank you for sharing. :)
"In the first 30 minutes..." That gave me shivers

One of the best scenes of the show. This conversation is really key to Root's character growth, Harold telling her that caring about another only makes you a more complete and better person. Beautiful stuff
Watching this show again, I keep coming back... Still the best series on any platform bar none. POI as a whole just cannot be matched.
